desc.en: After Aris' departure, the students of Millennium are at a loss as to what to do. At that moment, the enfeebled Momoi rouses herself up and declares that they cannot stand idly by, and insists that everyone go to save Aris.
desc.jp: After Aris' departure, the students of Millennium are at a loss as to what to do. At that moment, the enfeebled Momoi rouses herself up and declares that they cannot stand idly by, and insists that everyone go to save Aris.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 送走爱丽丝后，千禧年的学生们都不知该如何是好，原本受伤的桃井突然现身说不能坐以待毙，而且提议要一起去拯救爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 送走爱丽丝后，千年的学生们都不知该如何是好，原本受伤的桃井突然现身说不能坐以待毙，而且提议要一起去拯救爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 送走爱丽丝后，千年的学生们都不知该如何是好，原本受伤的桃突然现身说不能坐以待毙，而且提议要一起去拯救爱丽丝。

desc.en: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.jp: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师与游戏开发部、工程部与C&C分析当前形势。众人一致同意爱丽丝被带走属于紧急事件，而尼禄则从始至终都无法理解其中的缘由，众人开始重新梳理。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师与游戏开发部、工程师部与C&C分析当前形势。众人一致同意爱丽丝被带走属于紧急事件，而宁瑠则从始至终都无法理解其中的缘由，众人开始重新梳理。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师与游戏开发部、工程部与C&C分析当前形势。众人一致同意爱丽丝被带走属于紧急事件，而妮露则从始至终都无法理解其中的缘由，众人开始重新梳理。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: Rio told Aris that her real identity was in fact a "demon lord", and said that the only way to solve this was to destroy her halo. Yuzu and Midori believed the situation was untrue but words failed them. It was at this moment when Momoi showed up.
desc.jp: Rio told Aris that her real identity was in fact a "demon lord", and said that the only way to solve this was to destroy her halo. Yuzu and Midori believed the situation was untrue but words failed them. It was at this moment when Momoi showed up.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央向爱丽丝阐述爱丽丝实为“魔王”的身份，并表示只有破坏光环才能达成她的目的。柚子和绿坚信爱丽丝决不是这样，但却不好表达，就在这时桃井出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音向爱丽丝阐述爱丽丝实为“魔王”的身份，并表示只有破坏光环才能达成她的目的。柚子和绿坚信爱丽丝决不是这样，但却不好表达，就在这时桃井出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央向爱丽丝阐述爱丽丝实为“魔王”的身份，并表示只有破坏光环才能达成她的目的。柚子和绿坚信爱丽丝决不是这样，但却不好表达，就在这时桃出现。

desc.en: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.jp: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.zh_cn: 这里的未来，似乎看不到了。举例/联想：Alkaline Tears、第140首曲子
举例/联想：第135首曲子、第140首曲子

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Momoi appeared out of nowhere. Midori couldn't help but throw herself into Momoi's arms and wept. After knowing what happened, though hard to express feelings, Momoi said it was unacceptable and was determined to rescue Aris back. Everyone expressed approval and Neru even praised for her brave personality.
desc.jp: Momoi appeared out of nowhere. Midori couldn't help but throw herself into Momoi's arms and wept. After knowing what happened, though hard to express feelings, Momoi said it was unacceptable and was determined to rescue Aris back. Everyone expressed approval and Neru even praised for her brave personality.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井突然出现，绿立刻扑到了姐姐的怀里哭泣。桃井在听了事情经过后，表示虽然不好言说自己的感受，但她知道这一切都不可接受，并且表示一定要将爱丽丝救回来。大家都表示了赞同，尼禄甚至还表扬了桃井大胆敢说的性格。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井突然出现，绿立刻扑到了姐姐的怀里哭泣。桃井在听了事情经过后，表示虽然不好言说自己的感受，但她知道这一切都不可接受，并且表示一定要将爱丽丝救回来。大家都表示了赞同，宁瑠甚至还表扬了桃井大胆敢说的性格。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃突然出现，绿立刻扑到了姐姐的怀里哭泣。桃在听了事情经过后，表示虽然不好言说自己的感受，但她知道这一切都不可接受，并且表示一定要将爱丽丝救回来。大家都表示了赞同，妮露甚至还表扬了桃大胆敢说的性格。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
